rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment quotes neutral reporting on the commonality and history of the virus.
The segment uses 'strain is 'not a very common virus'', 'were reported' (not moderate verb), and 'had been detected'.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports strain prevalence data, which is not an explicit calming cue.
'Only around 160 isolates...in the 40 years to 2018' uses minimiser with explicit scale contrast.
